    P

    Phase - Interface in org.com.GamePhase
    This interface is the basic structure of the entire phase management.
    Player - Class in org.com.Models
    This java file is used to define a player in the game Contains all the attributes of a player.
    Player(String) - Constructor for class org.com.Models.Player
    This is a default constructor which is used in the beginning of the game to get player's name and assign random countries.

    PlayerOperationsHandler - Class in org.com.Handlers
    All operations related to a Player likeDeploycommand is written here
    PlayerOperationsHandler() - Constructor for class org.com.Handlers.PlayerOperationsHandler
     
    processAdvanceCommand(GamePhaseHandler, String[]) - Static method in class org.com.Handlers.PlayerOperationsHandler
     
    processAssignCountries(GamePhaseHandler) - Static method in class org.com.Handlers.PlayerOperationsHandler
    This method is used to divide the Loaded Map and Assign Countries among the registered players.
    processCommand(GamePhaseHandler, String) - Static method in class org.com.Handlers.CommandHandler
    Processes the given command based on the current game phase.
    processDeployArmies(GamePhaseHandler, String[]) - Static method in class org.com.Handlers.PlayerOperationsHandler
    This method marks the beginning of the game where players are asked to deploy all of their armies in their own countries. Only after a player deploys all of his/her armies, the next player's turn begins.
    processMap(GamePhaseHandler, String, boolean, boolean) - Static method in class org.com.Handlers.MapOperationsHandler
    This method is the key for processing a map for validation phase.
    processPlayerManagement(String, GamePhaseHandler) - Static method in class org.com.Handlers.PlayerOperationsHandler
    This method is used depicts the beginning of the player registration.
    processShowGameMap(GamePhaseHandler) - Static method in class org.com.Handlers.MapOperationsHandler
